fields.text: Thank you for calling DoorDash San Francisco, delivering good flavors and vibes to your door.
To place a new order, press '[INDEX]'.
To browse restaurants by cuisine, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our ordering specialist.
To reorder your past favorites, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we retrieve your past orders.
For existing order support or account questions, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we retrieve your delivery status.
To report an issue or ask a question, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with a support representative.
